mn3:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn3:2.3: ‘kinti me savaka dhammadayada bhaveyyum, no amisadayada’ti.
mn3:2.4: Tumhe ca me, bhikkhave, amisadayada bhaveyyatha no dhammadayada, tumhepi tena adiya bhaveyyatha:
mn3:2.8: Tumhe ca me, bhikkhave, dhammadayada bhaveyyatha, no amisadayada, tumhepi tena na adiya bhaveyyatha:
mn3:2.12: Tasmatiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadayada bhavatha, ma amisadayada.
mn3:2.14: ‘kinti me savaka dhammadayada bhaveyyum, no amisadayada’ti.
mn3:3.1: Idhaham, bhikkhave, bhuttavi assam pavarito paripunno pariyosito suhito yavadattho;
mn3:3.2: siya ca me pindapato atirekadhammo chaddaniyadhammo.
mn3:3.5: ‘aham khomhi, bhikkhave, bhuttavi pavarito paripunno pariyosito suhito yavadattho;
mn3:3.6: atthi ca me ayam pindapato atirekadhammo chaddaniyadhammo.
mn3:3.7: Sace akankhatha, bhunjatha, no ce tumhe bhunjissatha, idanaham appaharite va chaddessami, appanake va udake opilapessami’ti.
mn3:3.9: ‘bhagava kho bhuttavi pavarito paripunno pariyosito suhito yavadattho;
mn3:3.10: atthi cayam bhagavato pindapato atirekadhammo chaddaniyadhammo.
mn3:3.11: Sace mayam na bhunjissama, idani bhagava appaharite va chaddessati, appanake va udake opilapessati.
mn3:3.15: Yannunaham imam pindapatam abhunjitva iminava jighacchadubbalyena evam imam rattindivam vitinameyyan’ti.
mn3:3.16: So tam pindapatam abhunjitva teneva jighacchadubbalyena evam tam rattindivam vitinameyya.
mn3:3.18: ‘bhagava kho bhuttavi pavarito paripunno pariyosito suhito yavadattho;
mn3:3.19: atthi cayam bhagavato pindapato atirekadhammo chaddaniyadhammo.
mn3:3.20: Sace mayam na bhunjissama, idani bhagava appaharite va chaddessati, appanake va udake opilapessati.
mn3:3.21: Yannunaham imam pindapatam bhunjitva jighacchadubbalyam pativinodetva evam imam rattindivam vitinameyyan’ti.
mn3:3.22: So tam pindapatam bhunjitva jighacchadubbalyam pativinodetva evam tam rattindivam vitinameyya.
mn3:3.23: Kincapi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tam pindapatam bhunjitva jighacchadubbalyam pativinodetva evam tam rattindivam vitinameyya, atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca pasamsataro ca.
mn3:3.25: Tanhi tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno digharattam appicchataya santutthiya sallekhaya subharataya viriyarambhaya samvattissati.
mn3:3.26: Tasmatiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadayada bhavatha, ma amisadayada.
mn3:3.28: ‘kinti me savaka dhammadayada bhaveyyum, no amisadayada’”ti.
mn3:4.2: Idam vatvana sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
mn3:4.3: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhu amantesi:
mn3:4.5: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
mn3:5.1: “Kittavata nu kho, avuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato savaka vivekam nanusikkhanti, kittavata ca pana satthu pavivittassa viharato savaka vivekamanusikkhanti”ti?
mn3:5.2: “Duratopi kho mayam, avuso, agacchama ayasmato sariputtassa santike etassa bhasitassa atthamannatum.
mn3:5.3: Sadhu vatayasmantamyeva sariputtam patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho;
mn3:5.5: “Tena havuso, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn3:5.6: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
mn3:6.1: “Kittavata nu kho, avuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato savaka vivekam nanusikkhanti?
mn3:6.2: Idhavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato savaka vivekam nanusikkhanti,
mn3:6.3: yesanca dhammanam sattha pahanamaha, te ca dhamme nappajahanti,
mn3:6.4: bahulika ca honti, sathalika, okkamane pubbangama, paviveke nikkhittadhura.
mn3:6.5: Tatravuso, thera bhikkhu tihi thanehi garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.7: imina pathamena thanena thera bhikkhu garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.8: ‘Yesanca dhammanam sattha pahanamaha te ca dhamme nappajahanti’ti—
mn3:6.9: imina dutiyena thanena thera bhikkhu garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.10: ‘Bahulika ca, sathalika, okkamane pubbangama, paviveke nikkhittadhura’ti—
mn3:6.11: imina tatiyena thanena thera bhikkhu garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.12: Thera, avuso, bhikkhu imehi tihi thanehi garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.14: nava bhikkhu tihi thanehi garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.16: imina pathamena thanena nava bhikkhu garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.17: ‘Yesanca dhammanam sattha pahanamaha te ca dhamme nappajahanti’ti—
mn3:6.18: imina dutiyena thanena nava bhikkhu garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.19: ‘Bahulika ca honti, sathalika, okkamane pubbangama, paviveke nikkhittadhura’ti—
mn3:6.20: imina tatiyena thanena nava bhikkhu garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.21: Nava, avuso, bhikkhu imehi tihi thanehi garayha bhavanti.
mn3:6.22: Ettavata kho, avuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato savaka vivekam nanusikkhanti.
mn3:7.1: Kittavata ca panavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato savaka vivekamanusikkhanti?
mn3:7.2: Idhavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato savaka vivekamanusikkhanti—
mn3:7.3: yesanca dhammanam sattha pahanamaha te ca dhamme pajahanti;
mn3:7.4: na ca bahulika honti, na sathalika okkamane nikkhittadhura paviveke pubbangama.
mn3:7.5: Tatravuso, thera bhikkhu tihi thanehi pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.7: imina pathamena thanena thera bhikkhu pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.8: ‘Yesanca dhammanam sattha pahanamaha te ca dhamme pajahanti’ti—
mn3:7.9: imina dutiyena thanena thera bhikkhu pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.10: ‘Na ca bahulika, na sathalika okkamane nikkhittadhura paviveke pubbangama’ti—
mn3:7.11: imina tatiyena thanena thera bhikkhu pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.12: Thera, avuso, bhikkhu imehi tihi thanehi pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.14: nava bhikkhu tihi thanehi pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.16: imina pathamena thanena nava bhikkhu pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.17: ‘Yesanca dhammanam sattha pahanamaha te ca dhamme pajahanti’ti—
mn3:7.18: imina dutiyena thanena nava bhikkhu pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.19: ‘Na ca bahulika, na sathalika okkamane nikkhittadhura paviveke pubbangama’ti—
mn3:7.20: imina tatiyena thanena nava bhikkhu pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.21: Nava, avuso, bhikkhu imehi tihi thanehi pasamsa bhavanti.
mn3:7.22: Ettavata kho, avuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato savaka vivekamanusikkhanti.
mn3:8.1: Tatravuso, lobho ca papako doso ca papako.
mn3:8.2: Lobhassa ca pahanaya dosassa ca pahanaya atthi majjhima patipada cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
mn3:8.3: Katama ca sa, avuso, majjhima patipada cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati?
mn3:8.5: sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca sammakammanto sammaajivo sammavayamo sammasati sammasamadhi.
mn3:8.6: Ayam kho sa, avuso, majjhima patipada cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.

mn3:9-15.5: thambho ca papako sarambho ca papako,
mn3:9-15.6: mano ca papako atimano ca papako,
mn3:9-15.7: mado ca papako pamado ca papako.

mn3:9-15.11: sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca sammakammanto sammaajivo sammavayamo sammasati sammasamadhi.
mn3:9-15.12: Ayam kho sa, avuso, majjhima patipada cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati”ti.
mn3:9-15.14: Attamana te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam abhinandunti.
